Header.title: Hey, I'm Ryan Zhu
Header.paragraph: I'm a high school student and musician in Ontario, Canada. Read on to learn more about me!

About.paragraph: I am a high school student who enjoys coding and composing music. I am currently exploring web and app development in my free time, and planning on pursuing a career in a computer science field. I also have a hobby in composing and music; I have experimented with composing in many different styles of music, which are all available below.

Music.paragraph: Browse through my library of original compositions and arrangements, spanning various styles including Classicism, Romanticism, Impressionism, and Modernism.

Contact.paragraph: Send an email, or message me via any of the social media platforms below.
